biography.bio: Miro Noga was born on October 25, 1959 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Ranc U Zelené sedmy (1996), Hanele (1999) and Sedem jednou ranou (1991).
biography.name: Miro Noga

biography.bio: Oldrich Navrátil was born on October 21, 1952 in Trebíc, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for The City of the Sun (2005), Rafters (2006) and Incomplete Eclipse (1983).
biography.name: Oldrich Navrátil

biography.bio: Tomas Zilincik was born on January 3, 1943. He was an actor, known for Sedem jednou ranou (1991), Iná láska (1985) and Skleníková Venusa (1986). He died on January 9, 1993 in Martin, Slovakia.
biography.name: Tomas Zilincik

biography.bio: Amanda Sandrelli was born on October 31, 1964 in Lausanne, Switzerland as Amanda Paoli. She is an actress and director, known for Nirvana (1997), Christine Cristina (2009) and Nothing Left to Do but Cry (1984). She is married to Blas Roca-Rey. They have two children.
biography.name: Amanda Sandrelli

biography.bio: Mónica Molina was born on January 24, 1968 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Mónica Molina Tejedor. She is an actress, known for The Red Squirrel (1993), Hermanas (1998) and On Earth as It Is in Heaven (1995).
biography.name: Mónica Molina

biography.bio: Peter Simun was born on August 21, 1955 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Panelák (2008), Angel of Mercy (1993) and An Ambiguous Report About the End of the World (1997).
biography.name: Peter Simun

biography.bio: Günter Mack was born on December 12, 1930 in Augsburg, Germany. He was an actor, known for Alle meine Töchter (1995), Anita G. (1966) and Sieben Wochen auf dem Eis (1967). He was married to Wiltrud and Ulrike Luderer. He died on March 27, 2007 in Gröbenzell, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Günter Mack

biography.placeOfBirth: Prague, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Frantisek Cech was born on July 9, 1943 in Prague, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia. He is an actor and writer, known for The Best of Vecírek (1992), Sedm hladových (1988) and Prátelé Bermudského trojúhelníku (1987).
biography.name: Frantisek Cech

biography.bio: Ursula Kluková was born on August 17, 1941 in Nowa Ruda, Dolnoslaskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Doktori z Pocátku (2013), O princi Beckovi (1988) and O zapomnetlivém cernoknezníkovi (1991).
biography.name: Ursula Kluková

biography.bio: Karel Roden is an internationally known actor who was most recently seen in the United States in director Jaume Collet-Serra's "Orphan," starring Vera Farmiga and Peter Sarsgaard, and in Guy Ritchie's "RocknRolla," opposite Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton. His work can also be seen in such films as the hit comedy "Mr. Bean's Vacation," starring Rowan Atkinson; Wayne Kramer's "Running Scared," opposite Paul Walker and Vera Farmiga; Paul Greengrass' wildly successful "The Bourne Supremacy," the second film in the franchise starring Matt Damon; Guillermo del Toro's comics-based action thrillers "Hellboy" and "Blade II"; "Bulletproof Monk," starring Chow Yun-Fat and Seann William Scott; and "15 Minutes," starring Robert De Niro and Edward Burns. Roden has been nominated several times and recently won a prestigious Czech Lion Award for Best Actor for his work in the film "Guard No. 47," produced in his native country, the Czech Republic. He has acted in numerous Czech films, including "Jménem krále"; "The Eye"; "Holka Ferrari Dino"; "Bathory"; "Little Girl Blue"; "Bestiar"; "Vaterland - Lovecký deník"; and "Wild Flowers." Roden has also acted in a variety of films produced throughout Europe, including France's "Largo Winch," from director Jérôme Salle and starring Kristin Scott Thomas; Spain's "The Abandoned," Poland's "Summer Love"; and the UK's "Shut Up and Shoot Me" and "The Last Drop." He appeared as himself in Jan Nemec's documentary "Late Night Talks with Mother." On the small screen, Roden has appeared in the US series "The Philanthropist," the UK series "MI-5" and "The Scarlet Pimpernel," and in countless Czech productions, including the series "Trapasy" and the telepic "A Christmas Tale." A graduate of the Prague Dramatic Academy of Fine Arts, Roden hails from a long tradition of Czech actors: his younger brother, Marian, is also an actor, and both men followed in the footsteps of their father and grandfather. Roden's upcoming films include the horror thriller "Andrassy Street 60.," opposite Talia Shire and Barry Corbin; the German period drama "Habermann"; and "Alois Nebel," an animated feature from the Czech Republic.
biography.name: Karel Roden

biography.bio: Chris Greener was born on November 21, 1943 in New Brighton, Merseyside, England as Christopher Paul Greener. He was an actor and director, known for The Elephant Man (1980), The Princess and the Cobbler (1993) and Birdie Blues (2007). He died on February 11, 2015 in Bromley, Kent, England.
biography.name: Chris Greener

biography.bio: Elma Karlowa was born on March 12, 1932 in Zagreb, Yugoslavia as Selma-Karolina Karlowac. She was an actress, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Almenrausch und Edelweiß (1957) and Martha (1974). She died on December 31, 1994 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Elma Karlowa

biography.placeOfBirth: Zaporozh'ye, Kherson Oblast, Ukrainian SSR, USSR [now Zaporizhia, Ukraine]
biography.bio: Alexander Sizonenko was born on July 20, 1959 in Zaporozh'ye, Kherson Oblast, Ukrainian SSR, USSR as Alexander Alekseyevich Sizonenko. He was an actor, known for Sedem jednou ranou (1991). He died on January 5, 2012 in Saint Petersburg, Russia.
biography.name: Alexander Sizonenko
